library(readr)

gather_spread_test <- read_csv("Wrangle/gather_spread_test.csv")

gather <- gather_spread_test %>% select(contains("Q23_")) %>% gather(`Q23_Factor_a`, `Q23_Factor_b`, `Q23_Factor_c`, `Q23_Factor_d`, `Q23_Factor_e`, key = "factor", value = "cases")


gather_summary <- gather %>% group_by(cases, factor) %>% summarise(n = n())

* how can I use spread to get the cases column (values 1:5) as column heads, n as values, and factors as rows (5 total)

I've tried 
gather_summary %>% group_by(cases, factor) %>% summarise(n()) %>% spread(key = cases, value = n)

but i get the error 
Error: `var` must evaluate to a single number or a column name, not a function
